## Erc1155.getAll() method

Get All NFTs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAll(): Promise<EditionMetadata[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;EditionMetadata\[\]&gt;

The NFT metadata for all NFTs queried.

## Remarks

Get all the data associated with every NFT in this contract.

## Example


```javascript
const nfts = await contract.getAll();
console.log(nfts);
```
